Clock

class lib.clock.Clock(delay: float)

Bases: object

__init__(delay: float)

Runs a function on a time interval

Parameters

delay (float) – time to wait (seconds)

__weakref__

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

time_elapsed() → bool

Notifies if enough time has passed for the function to be run

Returns

if enough time has elapsed so function can be run

Return type

bool

update_time() → None

Updates the last_iteration of this clock object
